name: Yahtzee 6D
description:
Play the classic Wolfenstien but to regen health you need  to glory kill your opponents with Yathzee.

Controls

Move with wsad.

Look with left and right arrow keys.

Shoot with space.

Lock dice with space.

Glory kill with r.

Credits:

Programing: Aveo, Dexor, Orangelube

Graphics: OrangeLube

Audio: Dexor

GUI: Snailmusk
